Mission Orders

Akasha's inner circle can't be up to anything goodâ€”they're out to destroy the federation and those who subscribe to it.

Kill {@LinkCreature:493#5005#Akasha, Goddess of Epidemics}, {@LinkCreature:493#5004#Shargrim, Akalath Mutilator}, and {@LinkCreature:493#5003#Lugribar, Gilgash Devastator}.

Report to the nearest coordinator when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
